workflow: Register new user 2636. Open New Account (Savings). Click Accounts Overview. Click the new account. Click Transfer Funds. Transfer $50 to new account. Click Bill Pay. Pay 'Electric Co' $100. Find Transactions by Amount $50. Update Contact Info 'Phone' to '555-0000'. Logout.
